overview: Inspired by Homer’s Odyssey, SIREN SONG is a short VR cinematic experience that tries to recreate the magic of Ulysses’ adventure with the sirens. Created by French composer and director Denis Volte with the aid of a full orchestra and female choirs, it creates a sense of beauty and dread through sound. Each siren being spatialised, it enchants the viewer until the tragic end.
title: Siren Song
